heading: Action suspended (flow control)
quick_triage_bullets: Read preceding line for specific I/O error; Check /dev/xconsole; Add action name
root_causes_bullets: Unread pipe; disk full; permissions; downstream backpressure
fixes_bullets: Comment /dev/xconsole; free disk or fix perms; add name=... to actions
notes: Generic suspend; preceding line holds cause

heading: Action resumed
notes: Pairs with prior suspend; confirms recovery

heading: Timeout / connection issue
quick_triage_bullets: Check connectivity; firewall; SELinux port type on non-standard port
fixes_bullets: Open port; adjust SELinux; confirm remote

heading: TLS certificate problem
quick_triage_bullets: Check CN/SAN vs permitted peers; chain completeness
fixes_bullets: Fix SAN; add CA/chain; update permitted peers

heading: Module missing / not available
quick_triage_bullets: Check if module is built/installed; package contents
fixes_bullets: Install module package; rebuild with module

heading: Configuration parse problem
root_causes_bullets: Legacy vs RainerScript syntax; template missing
